pages.text: Redmost Wine is one of the greatest delights an occultist might obtain.$(br)Its color is red as blood, its reflection shimmers like a thousand stars.$(br)And the taste... $(o)oh the taste..!$()

Redmost Wine is created with the $(l:manipulation/entry_basin)Infusion Basin$(), by infusing a $(l:alchemy/entry_tincture)Arcane Tincture$() with $(li)Body Essence$(li)Water Essence$(li)Mind Essence$(li)Earth Essence$().
